title: Choosing Life: Welcome to the Choosing Life Podcast - Interview with the Director
description:
In this first episode of the Daily Wire's "Choosing Life" podcast, Michael Knowles and film-director Ian Reid talk about the recent majority opinion of the Supreme Court in Dobbs vs. Jackson Women's Health Organization, discuss the lies the pro-abortion movement has used since 1973 with the verdict in Roe v. Wade, and give a sneak peak of upcoming interviewees and their stories.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
